title: Garden of Liquid Light
description: This glass vessel collection translates Garden of Magic's sonic explorations into tangible form - each piece embodying a different frequency from Dora's musical palette, from crystalline piano improvisations to the deep weight of breakbeat rhythms. Like her live performances that blur genre boundaries in real time, these vessels dissolve the line between art object and functional form, creating physical spaces for the quiet magic that lives between beats.
